nodes.text: Neven Kothe was a male Human who lived on the planet Dantooine in the decades before the beginning of the Great Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Neven married a woman named Edra and had a Force-sensitive son named Ardun who was born in 3696 BBY, and Ardun was recruited into the Jedi Order during his childhood. Due to fragmentary records, Imperial Intelligence was unable to determine whether Edra and Neven had fled to the Core Worlds when the Great Galactic War began.
Neven Kothe was first mentioned in the Codex entry for Ardun Kothe in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
